plot: The family bonds of gun-smuggling mobsters are shattered when a death propels young Charles O'Shea to the head of power and his reckless nephew reignites a deep-seated feud with a drug lord.
title: Song of Roland
plot_es: The family bonds of gun-smuggling mobsters are shattered when a death propels young Charles O'Shea to the head of power and his reckless nephew reignites a deep-seated feud with a drug lord.
plot_en: The family bonds of gun-smuggling mobsters are shattered when a death propels young Charles O'Shea to the head of power and his reckless nephew reignites a deep-seated feud with a drug lord.
